name: memory of camping
description:
W A S D  for moving around

I think the memory that most stands out from 2018 is the camping trip I went on in summer. It was kind of a mess at first since the russian music festival we were going to was blocked since it only had one entrance and there was a car crash so no one could get in or out for hours.... but we went to a close by park and camped there and it turned out pretty good!

it's my first flatgame hee hee a bit simple but well i'm hoping to make some more this year!
